New Records: Ceddanne Rafaela hit his first big league home run, marking his first home run in his MLB career.
Key Match Events: Ceddanne Rafaela hit a 400-foot leadoff home run against the New York Yankees, which was his first career at-bat against the Yankees.
Post-Match Reflections: The Red Sox trail the Yankees 2-1 in the sixth inning after game one of the double-header.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Ceddanne Rafaela was batting.381 with an.885 OPS in 12 games before hitting his first home run.
Others: Ceddanne Rafaela is ranked as the No. 3 prospect in Boston's farm system and the No. 72 overall prospect in baseball.
